title: Buddhist devotees go in search of spiritual balance on temple retreat (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) A Buddhist monk talks to some of the participants of a weeklong retreat at Shanghai 's Jade Buddha Temple yesterday. The devotees' spiritual journey ended with an exercise in humility that involved
